value.title: 5G wireless networks leading fourth industrial revolution
value.excerpt: Network providers around the globe are launching 5G networks that can connect the handful of available 5G-capable devices. Currently, very few devices are connected to these new networks, allowing providers to tout headline grabbing download speeds of 1 Gbps plus.

value.title: VW admits Tesla’s lead in software and self-driving in internal leak

value.title: Chinese self-driving truck startup Inceptio raises $100 mln -sources
